subject: Monte Carlo Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Stanislas Wawrinka showed that his first Grand Slam title was not a fluke, upstaging his more illustrious Swiss countryman to win his first Masters trophy.
snippet: Stanislas Wawrinka showed that his first Grand Slam title was not a fluke, upstaging his more illustrious Swiss countryman to win his first Masters trophy.
